title: 旧约 - 箴言(Proverbs) - 第 22 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 箴言(Proverbs) -- 第 22 章 ( 本篇共有 31 章 )

lineList.en: A GOOD name is rather to be chosen than great riches, and loving favour rather than silver and gold.
lineList.cn: 美名胜过大财，恩宠强如金银。

lineList.en: The rich and poor meet together: the LORD is the maker of them all.
lineList.cn: 富户穷人，在世相遇，都为耶和华所造。

lineList.en: A prudent man foreseeth the evil, and hideth himself: but the simple pass on, and are punished.
lineList.cn: 通达人见祸藏躲。愚蒙人前往受害。

lineList.en: By humility and the fear of the LORD are riches, and honour, and life.
lineList.cn: 敬畏耶和华心存谦卑，就得富有，尊荣，生命，为赏赐。

lineList.en: Thorns and snares are in the way of the froward: he that doth keep his soul shall be far from them.
lineList.cn: 乖僻人的路上，有荆棘和网罗。保守自己生命的。必要远离。

lineList.en: Train up a child in the way he should go: and when he is old, he will not depart from it.
lineList.cn: 教养孩童，使他走当行的道，就是到老他也不偏离。

lineList.en: The rich ruleth over the poor, and the borrower is servant to the lender.
lineList.cn: 富户管辖穷人，欠债的是债主的仆人。

lineList.en: He that soweth iniquity shall reap vanity: and the rod of his anger shall fail.
lineList.cn: 撒罪孽的，必收灾祸。他逞怒的杖，也必废掉。

lineList.en: He that hath a bountiful eye shall be blessed; for he giveth of his bread to the poor.
lineList.cn: 眼目慈善的，就必蒙福。因他将食物分给穷人。

lineList.en: Cast out the scorner, and contention shall go out; yea, strife and reproach shall cease.
lineList.cn: 赶出亵慢人，争端就消除，分争和羞辱，也必止息。

lineList.en: He that loveth pureness of heart, for the grace of his lips the king shall be his friend.
lineList.cn: 喜爱清心的人，因他嘴上的恩言，王必与他为友。

lineList.en: The eyes of the LORD preserve knowledge, and he overthroweth the words of the transgressor.
lineList.cn: 耶和华的眼目，眷顾聪明人。却倾败奸诈人的言语。

lineList.en: The slothful man saith, There is a lion without, I shall be slain in the streets.
lineList.cn: 懒惰人说，外头有狮子，我在街上，就必被杀。

lineList.en: The mouth of strange women is a deep pit: he that is abhorred of the LORD shall fall therein.
lineList.cn: 淫妇的口为深坑，耶和华所憎恶的，必陷在其中。

lineList.en: Foolishness is bound in the heart of a child; but the rod of correction shall drive it far from him.
lineList.cn: 愚蒙迷住孩童的心，用管教的杖可以远远赶除。

lineList.en: He that oppresseth the poor to increase his riches, and he that giveth to the rich, shall surely come to want.
lineList.cn: 欺压贫穷为要利己的，并送礼与富户的，都必缺乏。

lineList.en: Bow down thine ear, and hear the words of the wise, and apply thine heart unto my knowledge.
lineList.cn: 你须侧耳听受智慧人的言语，留心领会我的知识，

lineList.en: For it is a pleasant thing if thou keep them within thee; they shall withal be fitted in thy lips.
lineList.cn: 你若心中存记，嘴上咬定，这便为美。

lineList.en: That thy trust may be in the LORD, I have made known to thee this day, even to thee.
lineList.cn: 我今日以此特特指教你，为要使你倚靠耶和华。

lineList.en: Have not I written to thee excellent things in counsels and knowledge,
lineList.cn: 谋略和知识的美事，我岂没有写给你吗。

lineList.en: That I might make thee know the certainty of the words of truth; that thou mightest answer the words of truth to them that send unto thee?
lineList.cn: 要使你知道真言的实理，你好将真言回覆那打发你来的人。

lineList.en: Rob not the poor, because he is poor: neither oppress the afflicted in the gate:
lineList.cn: 贫穷人，你不可因他贫穷，就抢夺他的物。也不可在城门口欺压困苦人。

lineList.en: For the LORD will plead their cause, and spoil the soul of those that spoiled them.
lineList.cn: 因耶和华必为他辨屈。抢夺他的，耶和华必夺取那人的命。

lineList.en: Make no friendship with an angry man; and with a furious man thou shalt not go:
lineList.cn: 好生气的人，不可与他结交。暴怒的人，不可与他来往。

lineList.en: Lest thou learn his ways, and get a snare to thy soul.
lineList.cn: 恐怕你效法他的行为，自己就陷在网罗里。

lineList.en: Be not thou one of them that strike hands, or of them that are sureties for debts.
lineList.cn: 不要与人击掌，不要为欠债的作保。

lineList.en: If thou hast nothing to pay, why should he take away thy bed from under thee?
lineList.cn: 你若没有什么偿还，何必使人夺去你睡卧的床呢。

lineList.en: Remove not the ancient landmark, which thy fathers have set.
lineList.cn: 你先祖所立的地界，你不可挪移。

lineList.en: Seest thou a man diligent in his business? he shall stand before kings; he shall not stand before mean men.
lineList.cn: 你看见办事殷勤的人吗，他必站在君王面前，必不站在下贱人面前。
